Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's conduct gave rise to a reasonable apprehension of bias or denial of a fair hearing
Evidence_Type: Document admissibility concerns raised but not formally challenged
Basis_of_Claim: Alleged bias and lack of adjournment
Evaluation_Standard: Reasonable apprehension of bias test: whether an informed person would think it more likely than not that the decision-maker would decide unfairly
Key_Factor_in_Determination: No evidence of animus or hostility; no formal adjournment request made
Application_Factor: Broad discretion of IAD regarding adjournments
Decision_Outcome: No finding of bias or procedural unfairness
Decision_Review_Issue: Fairness of hearing and impartiality of decision-maker
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Test for reasonable apprehension of bias
Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to demonstrate bias or procedural unfairness
Evidentiary_Issues: Concerns about document admissibility without formal objection
Procedural_Fairness: No denial of fair hearing found
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on procedural fairness and alleged bias
Procedural_Issue: Lack of formal adjournment request despite concerns
